name: Dvarapala
description: The Dvarapala is a Huge Giant that embodies the will of its patron deity, characterized by its exceptional strength, robust defenses, and divine qualities.
memorable: It has strong magical resistance, keen senses, and the ability to attack when foes come close.
goals: To serve as a guardian and protector for its deity, using its strength and abilities to deter intruders.
relations: May be encountered alongside other divine creatures or guardians in service to similar deities.
environment: Commonly found in areas of significance to its deity or in places requiring protection.
strengths: Possesses magic resistance, keen senses that enhance perception checks, and a powerful melee attack with a reach.
weaknesses: Has average Intelligence and very low Charisma, which may hinder social interaction.
attacks: It wields a gada for powerful melee attacks and can hurl javelins for ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Sweeping Strike enables it to target multiple creatures with a strong area effect attack, pushing foes away.
equipment: Gada, a melee weapon for close combat, and javelins for ranged attacks.
senses: Possesses keen senses with advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.
skills: Skilled in Perception and has knowledge of Religion, enhancing its role as a guardian.
additional_information: Immune to charmed, exhaustion, and frightened conditions.
Divine Words ability lets it communicate in a language associated with its deity.
Can innately cast spells like sacred flame and thunderwave.
Uses Magic Resistance to resist spells and magical effects.
Possesses a unique opportunity attack capability with You Shall Not Pass.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster with spells such as sacred flame (at will) and thunderwave (three times a day).
test_queries: giant guardian with powerful melee attacks
huge divine giant with magical resistance
tough giant that commands thunder and wind
strong giant with keen senses and spells
